A BODY OF WATER.Defintion: a piece or stretch of water

ANOMALIES.Defintion: something that is different to what is normal or expected

CANNONBALL.Defintion: the bullet or ball fired by a cannon

DEMARCATE.Defintion: set the boundaries or limits of

ENSHRINED IN LAW.Defintion: preserve (a right, tradition, or idea) in a form that ensures it will be protected and respected

FLARE UP.Defintion: a sudden outburst of something, especially violence or hostility

FRONTIER.Defintion: a line or border separating two countries

GIVES YOU THE MEASURE.Defintion: helps you understand (normally relating to the character or abilities of someone or something)

GLOSSING OVER.Defintion: treat with less attention than it deserves, miss parts of it

HERITAGE.Defintion: valued objects and qualities such as historic buildings and cultural traditions that have been passed down from previous generations

IMPINGE.Defintion: advance over an area belonging to someone or something else; encroach

IMPINGES.Defintion: advance over an area belonging to someone or something else; encroach

ORPHANED.Defintion: (of a child) both parents have died

PIRACY.Defintion: the practice of attacking and robbing ships at sea

RATIFIED.Defintion: sign or give formal consent to (a treaty, contract, or agreement), making it officially valid

SINGLE OUT.Defintion: choose someone or something from a group for special treatment

SOVEREIGN.Defintion: (of a nation or its affairs) acting or done independently and without outside interference

TREACLE.Defintion: a thick, sticky dark syrup made from partly refined sugar, used here to indicate that there is a lot of bureaucracy

UNDERMINES.Defintion: lessen the effectiveness, power, or ability of, especially gradually or insidiously

VIOLATING.Defintion: break or fail to comply with (a rule or formal agreement)

ZERO-SUM.Defintion: relating to or denoting a situation in which whatever is gained by one side is lost by the other
